changeSet.author: mat_dev_user
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `CQL_LIBRARY_H` ( `ID` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, 'CQL_LIBRARY_ID' in NOT NULL, `CQL` LONGTEXT, `ELM` LONGTEXT, `JSON` LONGTEXT, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), CONSTRAINT `CQL_LIBRARY_ID_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`CQL_LIBRARY_ID`) REFERENCES `CQL_LIBRARY`(`ID`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
